name: Forge Domain
description: Clerics of the Forge Domain serve deities of crafting and fire, blessing arms and armor, shaping metal with divine skill, and standing resilient amid flame and steel.

1.name: Forge Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor and smith’s tools.

1.name: Blessing of the Forge
1.description: At the end of a long rest, you can imbue one nonmagical weapon or suit of armor with a +1 bonus until your next long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan’s Blessing
2.description: You can conduct a short ritual to craft a simple metal object.

6.name: Soul of the Forge
6.description: You gain resistance to fire damage and a bonus to AC while wearing heavy armor.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra fire damage.

17.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
17.description: You gain immunity to fire damage and resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while wearing heavy armor.
